blogPost.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
blogPost.body: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
blogPost.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse
blogPost.author: Vahe Hovhannisyan

localize.description: 你关注谁是会所应用最重要的方面之一。显示给用户的房间是基于你选择关注的人和俱乐部。我整理了一份名单，列出了200个在Clubhouse上最有影响力的人。
你關注誰是會所應用最重要的方面之一。顯示給用戶的房間是基於你選擇關注的人和俱樂部。我整理了一份名單，列出了200個在Clubhouse上最有影響力的人。

previous.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
previous.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一个直观的，轻量级的估算工具，适合你现有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自动同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定义估算尺度 ⏰ 对分布式团队的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 远程将规划扑克带入生活

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一個直觀的，輕量級的估算工具，適合你現有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自動同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定義估算尺度 ⏰ 對分佈式團隊的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 遠程將規劃撲克帶入生活

next.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
next.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp

localize.description: TeamTime是专门为https://basecamp.com 用户设计的最简单、最精简、最安全的时间记录工具（移动和网络）。我们在与其他工具斗争后，为https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 创建了它。我们把它与你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的团队的时间跟踪

localize.description: TeamTime是專門爲https://basecamp.com 用戶設計的最簡單、最精簡、最安全的時間記錄工具（移動和網絡）。我們在與其他工具鬥爭後，爲https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 創建了它。我們把它與你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的團隊的時間跟蹤
